# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-110">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-111">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-112">9 个数字，可以是格式化模式，也可以是非格式化模式 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-114">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-115">四个数字，以 0、 1、 2、 3、 6、 7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-116">一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-117">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-118">一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-119">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-120">无格式：9个连续的数字，以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-121">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-122">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-123">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-124">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-125">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-126">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-146">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-148">八个数字，用点分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-150">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-151">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-152">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-153">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-154">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-155">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-157">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-159">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-160">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-161">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-173">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-175">6-10 个数字，带或不带 BSB 号码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-177">帐号为 6-10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-178">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-179">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-180">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-181">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-182">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-183">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-184">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-185">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-186">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-187">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-188">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-189">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-190">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-191">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-207">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-207">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-208">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-209">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-209">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-210">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-211">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-212">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-213">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-214">五位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-215">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-216">1-2 个可选字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-217">4-9 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-218">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-219">九个数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-220">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-221">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-222">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-223">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-224">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-225">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-226">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-326">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-328">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-330">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-331">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-332">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-333">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-334">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-336">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-338">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-339">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-340">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-341">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->

     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-353">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-353">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-354">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-355">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-355">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-356">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-357">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-357">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-358">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-359">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-360">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-361">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-361">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-362">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-362">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-363">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-363">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-397">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-397">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-399">8-9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-399">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-401">通常 8-9 位数字，显示中包含空格，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-401">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-402">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-402">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-403">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-403">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-404">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-404">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-405">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-405">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-406">2-3 位数字，最后一位数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-406">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-407">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-408">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-408">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-409">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-410">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-411">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-411">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-412">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-412">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-413">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-413">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-456">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-456">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-457">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-457">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-458">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-458">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-459">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-459">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-460">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-460">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-461">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-461">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-462">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-463">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-464">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-465">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-466">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-466">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-467">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-467">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-484">奥地利国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-484">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-485">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-486">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-487">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-487">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-488">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-489">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-489">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-490">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-490">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-491">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-491">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-492">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-493">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-493">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-494">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-495">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-496">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-496">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-497">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-497">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-501">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-503">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-503">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-504">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-504">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-506">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-506">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-507">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-508">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-508">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-509">一个字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-509">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-510">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-510">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-511">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-511">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-513">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-513">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-516">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-516">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-517">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-517">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-518">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-518">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-519">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-519">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-520">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-520">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-521">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-521">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-522">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-522">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-525">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-525">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-526">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-528">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-528">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-530">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-530">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-531">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-531">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-532">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-532">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-533">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-533">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-535">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-535">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-537">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-537">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-538">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-538">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-539">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-539">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-540">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-541">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-541">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-557">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-557">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-558">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-558">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-559">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-560">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-560">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-561">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-562">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-562">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-563">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-563">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-564">一个连字符（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-564">A hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-565">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-565">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-566">正斜杠（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-566">A forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-567">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-567">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-569">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-571">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-572">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-572">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-573">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-573">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-574">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-575">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-575">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-598">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-598">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-600">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-600">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-601">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-602">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-602">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-603">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-603">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-604">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-604">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-605">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-605">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-606">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-606">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-610">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-611">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-611">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-612">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-612">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-627">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-627">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-628">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-629">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-629">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-630">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-630">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-631">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-631">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-632">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-632">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-633">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-633">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-634">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-634">The string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-635">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-635">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-636">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-636">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-637">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-637">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-638">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-638">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-639">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-639">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-640">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-640">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-641">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-641">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-642">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-642">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-643">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-643">Any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-644">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-644">The string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-645">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-645">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-646">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-646">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-647">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-647">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-648">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-648">One or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-649">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-649">A semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-651">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-651">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-653">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-654">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-654">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-655">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-655">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-658"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-658">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-659">尚未</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-659">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-660">送交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-660">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-661">罗斯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-661">northwind</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-670">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-670">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-671">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-672">字符串 "HostName"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "azure 设备"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-672">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-673">net "和" SharedAccessKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-673">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-674">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-675">字符串 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-675">The string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-676">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-676">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-677">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-677">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-678">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-678">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-679">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-679">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-680">字符串 "azure 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-680">The string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-681">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-681">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-682">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-682">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-683">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-683">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-684">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-684">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-685">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-685">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-686">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-686">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-687">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-687">Any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-688">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-688">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-689">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-690">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-690">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-691">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-692">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-693">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-693">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-694">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-694">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-719">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-720">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-720">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-721">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-721">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-736">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-736">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-738">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-738">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-739">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-739">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-740">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-741">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-741">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-742">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-742">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-743">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-743">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-744">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-744">The string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-745">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-745">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-746">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-746">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-747">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-747">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-748">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-748">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-749">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-749">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-751">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-751">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-754">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-754">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-755">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-755">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-770">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-770">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-772">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-772">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-773">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-773">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-774">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-774">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-775">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-775">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-776">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-776">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-777">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-777">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-778">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-778">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-779">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-779">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-780">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-780">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-781">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-782">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-782">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-783">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-784">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-784">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-785">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-785">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-786">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-786">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-787">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-788">字符串 "终结点"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-788">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-789">net "和" SharedAccesKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-789">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-790">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-791">字符串 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-791">The string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-792">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-792">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-793">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-793">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-794">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-794">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-795">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-795">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-796">字符串 "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-796">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="51c13-797">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-797">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-798">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-798">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-799">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-799">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-800">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-800">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-801">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-801">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-802">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-803">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-803">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-804">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-804">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-805">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-806">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-807">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-808">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-808">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-809">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-809">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-810">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-810">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-825">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-825">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-826">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-827">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-827">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-829">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-829">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-830">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-830">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-831">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-831">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-832">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-832">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-833">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-833">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-834">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-834">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-835">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-835">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-836">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-836">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-837">0-2 空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-837">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-838">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-838">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-839">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-840">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-841">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-842">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-843">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-843">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-844">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-845">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-845">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-846">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-846">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-864"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-864">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-866">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-866">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-867">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-868">大于符号的 0-1 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-868">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-869">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-869">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-870">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-870">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-871">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-872">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-872">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-873">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-874">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-875">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-875">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-876">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-876">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-877">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-877">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-878">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-879">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-879">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-880">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-881">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-881">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-882">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-883">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-883">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-884">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-886">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-886">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-887">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-887">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
