## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-909">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-909">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-910">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-910">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-912">11 个数字加分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-912">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-913">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-914">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-914">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-915">六个数字加两个点，采用格式  YY.MM.DD，代表出生日期  </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-915">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-916">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-916">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-917">三个连续的数字（男性用奇数，女性用偶数） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-917">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-918">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-918">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-919">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-919">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-920">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-921">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-922">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-923">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-923">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-924">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-924">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-925">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-925">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-926">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-985">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-985">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-986">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-986">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-987">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-988">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-988">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-989">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-990">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-990">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-991">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-992">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-992">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-993">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-994">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-994">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-995">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-995">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-996">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-996">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-997">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-997">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-999">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-999">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1000">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1000">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1001">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1001">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1004">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1004">reisepass kein</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1006">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1006">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1007">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1007">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1008">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1009">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1009">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1010">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1011">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1011">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1012">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1013">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1013">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1014">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1015">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1015">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1016">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1016">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1017">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1017">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1018">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1019">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1039">比利时税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1039">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1040">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1040">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1041">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1041">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1042">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1042">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1043">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1043">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1044">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1044">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1045">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1045">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1046">"0" 或 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1046">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1047">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1047">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1048">"0" 或 "1" 或 "2" 或 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1048">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1049">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1049">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1050">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1051">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1051">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1052">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1053">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1054">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1054">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1055">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1055">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1114">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1114">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1115">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1116">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1116">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1117">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1118">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1118">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1119">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1119">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1120">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1120">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1121">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1121">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1122">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1122">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1123">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1123">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1124">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1124">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1125">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1125">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1126">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1126">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1127">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1127">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1128">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1129">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1129">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1130">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1131">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1131">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1132">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1132">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1133">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1133">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1134">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1135">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1136">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1136">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1137">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1149">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1149">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1151">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1151">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1152">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1153">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1153">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1154">两个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1154">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1155">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1155">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1156">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1156">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1157">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1157">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1158">三个数字（前 8 位数是注册号） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1158">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1159">正斜杠 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1159">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1160">四位分行号码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1160">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1161">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1161">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1162">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1162">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1164">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1166">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1166">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1167">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1167">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1168">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1168">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1169">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1170">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1170">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1171">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1171">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1172">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1194">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1194">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1195">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1196">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1196">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1199">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1199">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1200">两个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1200">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1201">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1201">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1202">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1202">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1203">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1203">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1204">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1204">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1205">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1205">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1206">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1206">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1208">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1208">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1209">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1209">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1210">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1210">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1211">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1212">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1213">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1214">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1215">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1215">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1216">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1219">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1219">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1231">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1231">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1232">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1232">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1234">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1234">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1235">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1236">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1236">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1237">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1238">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1238">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1239">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1240">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1241">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1241">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1242">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1242">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1261">保加利亚国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1261">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1262">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1263">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1264">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1264">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1265">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1266">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1266">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1267">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1267">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1268">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1268">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1269">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1269">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1270">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1270">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1271">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1272">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1272">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1273">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1274">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1275">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1275">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1276">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1276">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1277">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1278">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1323">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1323">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1324">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1324">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1325">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1325">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1326">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1326">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1327">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1327">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1328">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1328">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1329">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1330">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1330">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1331">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1332">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1332">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1333">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1333">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1334">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1334">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1335">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1335">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1336">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1336">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1337">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1337">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1338">保加利亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1338">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1339">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1339">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1340">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1340">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1341">保加利亚纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1341">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1342">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1342">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1344">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1344">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1346">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1346">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1347">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1348">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1348">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1349">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1350">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1350">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1351">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1351">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1352">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1352">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1353">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1353">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1354">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1399">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1399">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1400">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1401">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1401">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1402">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1403">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1403">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1404">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1404">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1405">五位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1405">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1406">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1406">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1407">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1407">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1408">一个零“0” </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1408">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1409">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1409">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1410">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1411">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1412">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1413">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1414">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1414">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1415">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1415">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1416">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1416">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1417">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1417">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1418">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1418">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1419">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1419">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1443">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1443">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1445">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1445">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1446">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1447">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1447">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1448">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1449">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1449">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1450">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1451">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1452">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1452">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1453">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1453">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1454">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1454">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1590">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1590">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1591">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1592">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1592">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1593">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1594">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1594">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1596">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1596">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1598">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1599">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1599">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1600">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1600">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1612">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1612">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1613">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1614">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1614">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1615">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1616">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1616">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1617">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1618">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1619">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1620">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1621">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1621">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1622">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1622">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1652">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1652">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1654">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1654">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1655">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1656">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1656">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1657">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1658">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1659">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1660">DLP 策略75% 确信在300个字符的邻近度内检测到此类型的敏感信息：正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1661">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1661">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1690">New Brunswick</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1690">New Brunswick</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1691">Nova Scotia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1691">Nova Scotia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1692">Prince Edward Island</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1692">Prince Edward Island</span></span>

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1694">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1694">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1696">九个数字，包含可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1696">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1698">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1698">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1699">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1699">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1700">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1700">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1701">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1701">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1702">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1702">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1703">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1703">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1704">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1704">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1705">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1706">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1706">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1707">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1708">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1709">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1709">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1710">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1710">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1711">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1711">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1712">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1712">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1713">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1713">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1714">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1715">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1715">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1716">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1716">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1717">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1717">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1718">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1718">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1734">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1734">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1735">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1735">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1743">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1743">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1745">7-8 位数加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1745">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1747">7-8 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1747">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1748">1-2 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1748">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1749">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1749">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1750">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1750">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1751">一个点 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1751">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1752">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1752">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1753">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1753">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1754">一个数字或字母（不区分大小写），是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1754">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1755">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1756">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1756">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1757">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1758">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1758">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1759">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1759">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1760">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1760">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1761">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1761">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1762">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1763">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1763">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1764">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1779">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1779">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1781">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1781">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1783">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1783">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1784">其中六个数字是地址代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1784">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1785">八个数字，采用  YYYYMMDD 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1785">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1786">三个数字，是顺序代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1786">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1787">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1787">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1789">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1791">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1792">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1792">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1793">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1793">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1794">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1794">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1796">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1796">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1797">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1810">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1810">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1811">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1811">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1812">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1812">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1813">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1813">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1814">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1814">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1815">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1816">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1816">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-1817">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1819">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1819">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1820">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1820">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1821">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1821">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1822">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1822">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1823">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1823">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1824">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1824">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-1825">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1825">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1826">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1826">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-1827">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-1827">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2033">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2033">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2034">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2034">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2035">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2035">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2036">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2036">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2037">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2037">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2038">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2038">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2039">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2040">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2040">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2041">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2042">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2043">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2043">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2044">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2044">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2045">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2045">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2059">vozačka dozvola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2059">vozačka dozvola</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2060">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2060">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2061">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2061">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2062">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2063">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2063">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2064">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2065">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2065">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2066">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2067">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2068">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2069">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2070">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2070">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2071">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2071">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
