## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2102">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2102">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2103">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2103">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2105">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2105">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2106">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2107">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2107">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2108">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2108">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2109">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2109">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2110">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2110">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2111">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2112">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2112">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2113">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2113">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2114">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2114">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2116">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2116">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2117">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2117">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2118">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2118">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2119">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2119">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2120">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2120">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2122">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2122">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2123">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2124">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2124">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2125">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2125">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2126">最后一个数字是用于国际数据交换目的的校验位，字母 HR 将加上11位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2126">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2127">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2128">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2128">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2129">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2131">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2131">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2132">找到 Keyword_croatia_oib_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2132">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2133">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2133">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2134">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2135">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2135">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2136">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2137">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2137">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2139">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2139">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2141">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2141">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2142">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2142">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2143">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2143">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2144">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2145">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2145">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2146">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2146">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2147">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2147">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2148">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2148">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2149">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2150">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2151">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2152">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2153">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2154">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2154">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2155">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2155">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2156">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2157">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2157">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2158">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2158">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2174">克罗地亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2174">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2175">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税 Identificaiton 号码敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2175">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2176">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2176">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2177">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2177">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2178">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2178">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2179">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2179">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2180">10个数字，随机选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2180">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2181">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2181">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2182">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2183">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2183">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2184">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2185">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2186">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2186">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2187">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2187">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2188">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2189">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2189">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2220">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2220">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2221">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2221">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2222">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2223">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2223">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2224">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2225">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2225">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2226">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2227">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2228">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2229">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2230">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2230">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2231">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2231">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2246">塞浦路斯国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2246">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2247">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2247">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2248">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2249">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2249">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2250">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2250">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2251">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2251">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2252">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2252">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2254">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2254">Definition</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2256">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2256">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2257">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2257">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2266">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2266">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2267">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2267">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2269">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2269">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2271">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2271">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2273">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2276">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2276">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2277">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2277">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2278">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2278">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2280">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2280">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2281">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2281">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2282">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2282">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2284">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2284">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2285">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2285">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2287">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2287">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2288">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2289">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2289">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2290">一个 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2290">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2291">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2291">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2292">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2292">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2293">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2294">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2295">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2296">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2297">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2297">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2298">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2298">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2300">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2300">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2329">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2329">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2330">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2332">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2332">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2334">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2334">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2335">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2335">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2336">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2336">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2337">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2337">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2338">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2339">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2340">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2341">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2342">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2342">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2343">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2343">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2348">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2348">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2349">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2349">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2350">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2350">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2351">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2351">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2352">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2352">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2353">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2353">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2354">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2354">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2355">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2355">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2356">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2356">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2357">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2357">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2358">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2358">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2360">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2360">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2361">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2361">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2362">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2363">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2363">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2364">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2365">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2365">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2366">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2367">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2367">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2368">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2369">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2370">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2370">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2371">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2371">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2379">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2379">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2380">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识号捆绑包中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2380">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2381">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2382">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2382">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2383">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2384"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2384">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2385">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2385">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2386">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2386">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2387">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2387">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2388">一个正斜杠 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2388">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2389">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2389">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2390"> (新格式) 的10个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2390">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2391">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2391">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2392">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2392">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2393">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2393">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2394">一个正斜杠 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2394">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2395">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2395">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2397">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2399">DLP 策略85% 确信在300个字符的邻近度内检测到此类型的敏感信息：函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2400">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2400">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2401">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2401">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2402">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2402">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2403">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2403">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2404">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2404">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2405">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2405">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2406">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2407">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2408">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2408">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2409">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2410">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2410">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2411">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2411">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2412">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2412">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2413">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2413">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2414">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2414">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2416">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2419">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2419">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2420">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2420">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2421">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2422">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2422">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2438">捷克语税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2438">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2439">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2441">9个或10个数字，带可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2441">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2443">9个或10个数字，可选 backslashl：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2443">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2444">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2445">反斜杠 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2445">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2446">三个或四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2446">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2448">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2448">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2451">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2451">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2452">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2452">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2478">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2478">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2479">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2479">tax registration number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2491">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2491">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2492">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2492">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2494">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2494">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2495">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2496">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2496">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2497">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2498">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2498">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2499">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2500">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2501">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2501">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2502">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2502">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2514">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2514">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2519">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2519">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2520">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2520">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2521">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2522">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2522">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2523">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2523">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2524">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2524">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2525">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2526">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2526">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2527">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2528">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2529">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2529">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2530">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2530">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2531">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2531">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2535">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2535">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2538">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2538">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2539">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2540">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2541">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2541">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2542">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2543">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2543">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2544">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2544">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2545">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2545">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2546">四个数字，最后一位数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2546">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2547">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2548">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2548">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2549">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2550">DLP 策略75% 确信在300个字符的邻近度内检测到此类型的敏感信息：正则表达式 Regex_denmark_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2551">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2551">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2552">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2596">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2596">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2597">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2597">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2604">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2604">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2605">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2606">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2607">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2607">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2608">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2609">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2609">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2610">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2610">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2611">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2611">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2612">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2612">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2613">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2614">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2615">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2616">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2616">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2617">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2617">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2618">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2618">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2619">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2620">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2620">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2634">丹麦税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2634">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2635">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2635">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2636">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2637">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2637">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2638">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2639">包含 hyphenl 的10个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2639">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2640">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2640">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2641">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2641">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2642">与序列号相对应的四个数字，其中第一个数字对应于出生世纪，而最后一个数字对应于个人的性别 (对于男为奇数，甚至对于女性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2642">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2643">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2644">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2644">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2645">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2646">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2646">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2647">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2647">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2648">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2648">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2650">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2650">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2702">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2702">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2704">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2704">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2705">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2706">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2706">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2707">这一组可能的字母（不区分大小写）中的一个字母：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2707">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2708">一个字母（不区分大小写），这是注册人姓氏的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2708">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2709">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2709">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2710">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2710">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2711">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2711">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2712">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2712">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2713">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2713">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2714">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2714">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2715">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2715">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2716">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2716">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2717">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2717">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2718">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2718">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2719">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2719">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2721">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2721">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2722">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2723">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2723">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2724">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2724">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2725">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2725">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2727">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2729">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2729">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2730">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2730">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2731">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2731">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2732">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2732">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2734">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2734">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2735">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2735">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2736">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2736">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2737">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2737">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2738">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2738">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2739">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2739">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2740">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2740">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2741">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2741">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2742">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2742">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2743">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2743">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2744">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2744">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2745">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2745">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2747">爱沙尼亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2747">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2748">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2748">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2749">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2750">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2750">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2751">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2752">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2752">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2753">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2753">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2754">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2754">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2755">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2755">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2756">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2756">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2757">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2758">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2759">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2760">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2761">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2761">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2762">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2762">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2763">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2764">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2764">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2797">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2797">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2798">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2799">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2800">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2800">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2801">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2802">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2802">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2803">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2804">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2805">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2806">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2807">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2808">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2809">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2809">Keywords</span></span>
