## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2815">爱沙尼亚纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2815">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2816">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2817">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2818">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2818">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2819">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2820">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2820">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2821">一种与性别和世纪相对应的数字，其中奇数表示男，偶数表示女，如下所示：1，2代表19世纪;3，4表示20世纪;对于21世纪，为5，6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2821">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2822">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2822">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2823">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2823">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2824">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2824">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2825">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2825">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2826">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2826">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2827">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2827">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2828">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2828">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2829">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2829">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2830">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2830">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2831">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2832">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2832">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2865">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2865">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2866">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2867">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2867">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2868">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2869">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2869">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2870">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2871">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-2872">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-2873">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2874">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2874">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2875">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2875">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2876">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2876">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2877">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2877">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2878">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2878">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2879">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2879">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2880">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2880">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-2881">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-2881">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3327">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3327">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3328">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3330">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3330">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3332">10个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3332">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3333">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3334">一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3334">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3335">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3335">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3336">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3337">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3337">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3338">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3339">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3340">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3340">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3341">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3341">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3342">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3342">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3344">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3344">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3345">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3345">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3346">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3346">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3347">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3347">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3348">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3348">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3349">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3349">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3350">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3350">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3351">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3351">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3352">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3352">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3353">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3353">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3354">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3354">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3355">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3355">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3357">芬兰国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3357">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3358">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3358">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3359">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3360">六个数字加一个字符（表示一个世纪），加三个数字再加一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3360">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3361">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3362">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3362">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3363">采用 DDMMYY 格式的六位数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3363">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3364">世纪标记（“-”、“+”或“a”）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3364">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3365">三位个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3365">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3366">一个数字或字母（区分大小写），是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3366">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3367">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3368">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3368">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3369">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3370">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3370">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3371">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3371">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3372">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3372">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3373">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3373">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3422">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3422">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3423">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3423">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3424">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3424">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3425">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3425">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3426">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3427">九个字母和数字的组合：两个字母 (不区分大小写) 七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3427">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3428">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3428">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3429">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3429">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3430">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3430">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3431">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3431">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3432">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3432">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3433">找到 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3433">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3434">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3434">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3436">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3436">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3437">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3437">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3438">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3438">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3439">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3441">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3441">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3443">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3443">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3444">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3445">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3445">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3446">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3446">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3447">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3447">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3448">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3448">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3449">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3449">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3450">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3450">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3451">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3452">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3452">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3453">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3455">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3455">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3456">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3456">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3457">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3458">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3458">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3482">芬兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3482">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3483">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3485">一个11字符组合的数字、字母、加号和减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3485">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3486">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3487">一个11个字符的数字、字母和加号和减号的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3487">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3488">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3488">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3489">以下之一：加号、减号或字母 "A" (不区分大小写) ，其中加号表示介于1800-1899 之间，负号意味着在1900-1999 之间出生，而 "A" 表示出生2000和之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3489">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3490">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3490">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3491">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3491">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3492">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3493">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3493">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3494">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3495">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3495">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3496">函数  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3496">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3497">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3497">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3498">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3498">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3499">函数  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3499">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3526">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3550">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3550">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3551">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3551">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3553">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3553">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3555">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3555">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3557">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3557">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3559">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3559">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3560">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3560">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3561">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3561">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3562">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3562">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3563">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3563">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3564">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3564">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3565">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3565">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3566">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3566">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3568">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3568">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3569">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3569">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3570">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3570">permis de conduire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3571">licence number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3571">licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3572">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3572">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3573">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3573">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3574">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3574">license numbers</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3575">法国国家标识卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3575">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3576">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3576">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3578">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3578">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3580">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3582">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3584">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3584">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3585">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3585">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3587">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3590">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3590">cni#</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3598">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3598">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3599">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3599">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3600">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3601">9 个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3601">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3602">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3603">九位数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3603">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3604">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3605">两个字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3605">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3606">五位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3606">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3610">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3611">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3611">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3612">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3612">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3633">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3633">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3634">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3634">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3636">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3636">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3638">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3638">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3639">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3639">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3640">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3640">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3641">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3641">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3642">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3643">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3643">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3644">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3645">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3645">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3646">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3646">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3647">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3647">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3648">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3648">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3650">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3650">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3651">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3651">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3652">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3652">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3678">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3678">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3679">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3679">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3680">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3681">13位数的个人和九个数字的实体</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3681">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3682">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3683">适用于个人的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3683">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3684">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3684">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3685">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3685">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3686">9个图元数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3686">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3687">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3688">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3688">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3689">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3690">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3691">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3691">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3692">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3692">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3693">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3694">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3694">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3702">免税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3702">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3703">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3703">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3704">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3704">tax registration number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3711">纳税人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3711">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3712">tin 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3712">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3713">锡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3713">tin#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3714">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3714">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3715">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3715">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3716">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3717">11 个数字和字母组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3717">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3718">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3719">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3719">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3720">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3720">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3721">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3721">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3722">六位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3722">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3723">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3723">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3724">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3724">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3726">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3728">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3728">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3729">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3729">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3730">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3731">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3731">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3732">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3732">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3733">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3733">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3734">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3734">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3735">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3736">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3736">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3737">Führerschein-nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3737">Führerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3738">Fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3738">Fuhrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3739">Fuehrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3739">Fuehrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3740">Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3740">Führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3741">Fuhrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3741">Fuhrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3742">Fuehrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3742">Fuehrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3743">Führerschein-nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3743">Führerschein-</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3744">Fuhrerschein-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3744">Fuhrerschein-</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3745">Fuehrerschein-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3745">Fuehrerschein-</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3746">FührerscheinnummerNr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3746">FührerscheinnummerNr</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3827">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3827">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3828">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3828">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3829">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3829">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3830">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3830">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3831">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3831">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3832">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3832">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3834">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3834">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3835">一个字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3835">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3836">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3836">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3837">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3837">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3838">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3838">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3839">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3840">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3840">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3841">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3842">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3842">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3843">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3843">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3844">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3844">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3860">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3860">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3861">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3861">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3863">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3863">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3865">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3865">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3866">第一个字符是这一组（C、F、G、H、J、K）中的数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3866">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3867">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3867">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3868">五位数字或字母都来源于这一组（C、-H、J-N、P、R、T，V-Z）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3868">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3869">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3869">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3870">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3871">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3872">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3873">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3874">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3874">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3875">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3875">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3876">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3876">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3877">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3877">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3878">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3878">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3879">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3879">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3880">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3898">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3898">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3899">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3899">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3900">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3901">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3901">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3902">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3903">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3903">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3904">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3904">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3905">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3905">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3907">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3909">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3910">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3910">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3911">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3911">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3913">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3913">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3939">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3939">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3940">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3940">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3941">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3942">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3942">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3943">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3943">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3944">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3944">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3945">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3946">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3946">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3947">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3948">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3948">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3949">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3949">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3950">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3950">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3967">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3967">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3968">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3968">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3970">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3970">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3971">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3972">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3972">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3973">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3973">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3974">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3974">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3975">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3975">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3976">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3976">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3977">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3977">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3978">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3978">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3979">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3979">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3981">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3984">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3984">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3985">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3985">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3986">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3986">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3988">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3988">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3989">希腊国家 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3989">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3990">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3990">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3991">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3991">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3992">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3992">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3993">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3993">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3994">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3994">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-3995">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3995">ταυτότητας</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3996">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3996">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3997">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-3998">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-3999">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-3999">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4000">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4001">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4001">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4002">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4003">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4003">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4004">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4005">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4005">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4006">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4006">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4007">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4007">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4008">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4008">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4010">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4010">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4011">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4011">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4012">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4012">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4013">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4013">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4014">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4014">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4015">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4015">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4016">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4016">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4017">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4017">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4018">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4018">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4019">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4019">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4020">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4021">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4021">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4022">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4023">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4024">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4024">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4025">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4025">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4027">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4027">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>
