- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4053">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4053">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span></span>


## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4054">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4054">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4055">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4055">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4056">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4056">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4057">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4057">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4058">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4058">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4059">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4059">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4060">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4060">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4061">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4061">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4063">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4065">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4066">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4066">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4067">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4067">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4068">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4069">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4069">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4070">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4070">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4071">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4111">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4111">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4112">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4112">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4114">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4114">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4116">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4116">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4117">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4117">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4118">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4118">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4122">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4123">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4123">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4124">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4124">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4126">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4126">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4130">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4130">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4140">匈牙利国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4140">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4141">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4141">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4142">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4142">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4143">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4143">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4144">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4144">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4145">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4145">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4146">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4146">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4147">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4147">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4148">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4148">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4149">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4150">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4151">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4152">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4153">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4154">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4154">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4155">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4155">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4156">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4157">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4157">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4168">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4168">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4169">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4169">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4170">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4171">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4171">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4172">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4173">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4173">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4174">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4175">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4175">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4176">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4177">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4177">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4178">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4178">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4179">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4179">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4180">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4180">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4181">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4181">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4182">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4182">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4183">匈牙利语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4183">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4184">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4184">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4185">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4185">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4186">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4186">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4187">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4189">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4189">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4191">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4191">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4193">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4193">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4196">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4196">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4197">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4197">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4199">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4199">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4219">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4219">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4220">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4220">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4222">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4222">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4223">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4224">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4224">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4225">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4225">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4226">与日期01/01/1867 之间的天数对应的五个数字和个人的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4226">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4227">三个数字，对应于通过机会区分在同一天的人所生成的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4227">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4228">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4228">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4229">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4230">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4230">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4231">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4232">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4232">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4233">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4233">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4234">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4234">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4235">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4235">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4236">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4236">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4262"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4262">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4263">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4264">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4264">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4265">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4266">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4266">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4267">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4267">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4268">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4268">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4269">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4269">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4270">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4271">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4271">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4272">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4273">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4273">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4274">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4274">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4275">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4275">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4276">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4276">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4277">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4277">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4279">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4279">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4281">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4281">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4282">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4282">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4283">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4283">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4284">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4284">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4285">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4285">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4286">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4286">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4287">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4287">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4288">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4288">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4289">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4289">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4290">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4290">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4292">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4292">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4294">DLP 策略85% 确信在300个字符的邻近度内检测到此类型的敏感信息：函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4294">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4295">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4295">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4296">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4296">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4297">DLP 策略75% 确信在300个字符的邻近度内检测到此类型的敏感信息：函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4297">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4298">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4298">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4299">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4299">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4300">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4300">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4301">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4301">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4302">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4302">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4303">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4303">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4304">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4304">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4305">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4305">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4306">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4307">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4307">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4308">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4309">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4309">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4310">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4310">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4311">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4311">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4312">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4312">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4313">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4313">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4314">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4314">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4315">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4315">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4316">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4316">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4317">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4317">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4318">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4319">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4319">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4320">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4321">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4322">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4322">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4323">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4323">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4324">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4324">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4325">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4325">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4326">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4326">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4327">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4327">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4328">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4328">KTP</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4330">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4330">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4331"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4331">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4333">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4333">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4334">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4335">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4335">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4336">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4336">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4337">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4337">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4338">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4338">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4339">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4339">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-p134">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-p134">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4342">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4342">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4343">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4344">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4345">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4346">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4346">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4347">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4347">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4348">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4348">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4349">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4349">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4350">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4350">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4351">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4351">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4352">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4353">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4353">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4354">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4355">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4355">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4356">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4356">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4357">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4357">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4358">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4358">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4359">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4359">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4360">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4360">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4361">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4361">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4363">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4363">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4364">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4364">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4365">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4365">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4366">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4366">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4367">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4367">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4368">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4368">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4369">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4369">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4370">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4371">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4371">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4372">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4373">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4373">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4374">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4375">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4376">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4377">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4377">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4378">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4378">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4379">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4379">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4380">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4380">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4381">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4381">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4382">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4382">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4383">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4383">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4384">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4384">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4385">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4385">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4386">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4386">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4387">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4387">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4388">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4389">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4389">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4390">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4390">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4391">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4391">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4392"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4392">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4393">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4393">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4395">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4397">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4397">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4398">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4398">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4399">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4399">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4400">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4400">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4401">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4401">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4402">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4402">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4403">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4403">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4404">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4404">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4405">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4405">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4406">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4406">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4407">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4407">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4408">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4408">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4409">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4409">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4410">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4410">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4411">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4411">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4412">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4412">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4413">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4413">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4414">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4415">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4416">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4416">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4417">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4418">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4418">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4419">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4419">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4420">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4420">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4421">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4422">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4422">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4423">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4424">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4425">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4425">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4426">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4426">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4427">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4427">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4428">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4428">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4429">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4429">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4430">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4430">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4431">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4431">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4432">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4432">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4433">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4433">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4434">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4434">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4435">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4435">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4436">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4436">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4437">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4437">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4438">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4438">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4439">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4439">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4440">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4440">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4441">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4441">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4442">爱尔兰国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4442">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4443">此敏感信息类型实体仅包含在欧盟国家/地区标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4443">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4445">指定模式中的字母、数字和空格的九个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4445">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4446">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4447">指定模式中的字母、数字和空格的九个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4447">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4448">从01年1月2013到现在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4448">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4449">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4449">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4450">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4450">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4451">一个空格或大写的字母 "W" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4451">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4452">在01月1日之前1月2013：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4452">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4453">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4453">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4454">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4454">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4455">一个空格或大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4455">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4457">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4457">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4459">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4459">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4460">函数找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4460">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4461">找到了中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4461">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4462">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4463">函数找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4463">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4464">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4464">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4465">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4465">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4492">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4492">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4493">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4495">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4495">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4497">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4497">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4498">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4498">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4499">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4499">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4500">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4501">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4502">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4503">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4504">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4504">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4505">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4505">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4506">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4506">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4507">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4507">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4508">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4508">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4509">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4509">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4510">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4510">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4511">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4511">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4512">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4512">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4513">passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4513">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4514">passeport numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4514">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4515">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4515">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4516">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4517">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4517">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4518">七位数字后跟 1-2  个字母 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4518">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4519">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4519">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4520">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4520">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4522">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4522">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4523">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4523">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4524">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4524">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4525">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4525">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4526">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4526">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4527">一个字母（不区分大小写），是字母校验位 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4527">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4528">字母“A”或“H”（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4528">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4532">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4533">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4533">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4534">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4534">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4535">找到 Keyword_ireland_pps 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4535">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4536">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4536">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4537">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4538">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4538">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4539">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4539">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4540">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4541">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4541">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4542">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4542">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4543">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4543">Personal Public Service Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4544">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4544">PPS Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4545">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4545">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4546">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4546">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4547">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4547">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4548">.PPS#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4548">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4549">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4549">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4550">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4550">Public Services Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4551">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4551">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4552">Uimh.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4552">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4553">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4553">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4554">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4554">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4555">爱尔兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4555">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4556">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4558">七位数字后跟一个不带空格或分隔符的字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4558">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4559">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4560">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4560">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4561">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4561">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4562">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4562">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4563">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4564">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4564">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4565">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4566">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4566">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4567">函数  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4567">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4568">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4568">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4570">函数  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4570">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4571">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4571">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4572">Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4572">Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4573">客户端标识服务</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4573">client identity service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4574">identification number
