## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4599">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4599">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4600">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4601">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4601">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4602">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4603">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4603">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4604">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4605">破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4605">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4606">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4606">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4607">破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4607">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4608">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4608">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4609">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4609">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4610">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4610">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4611">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4612">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4613">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4614">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4615">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4615">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4616">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4616">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4617">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4617">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4619">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4619">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4620">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4620">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4621">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4621">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4623">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4623">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4624">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4624">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4625">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4625">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4626">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4626">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4627">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4627">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4628">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4628">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4629">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4629">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4630">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4630">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4631">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4631">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4632">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4632">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4633">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4633">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4634">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4634">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4635">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4635">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4637">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4637">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4638">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4638">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4639">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4639">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4640">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4641">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4642">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4642">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4643">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4643">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4644">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4644">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4645">一个字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4645">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4646">字母“A”或者“V”（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4646">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4647">七个字母（不区分大小写）、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4647">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4648">一个字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4648">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4649">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4649">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4650">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4651">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4651">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4652">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4653">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4653">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4654">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4654">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4655">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4655">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4657">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4657">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4658">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4658">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4659">意大利国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4659">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4660">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4660">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4662">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4662">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4664">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4664">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4665">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4665">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4666">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4666">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4667">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4667">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4668">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4668">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4669">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4669">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4670">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4670">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4671">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4671">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4672">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4673">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4673">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4674">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4675">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4676">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4676">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4677">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4677">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4678">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4678">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4679">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4679">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4714">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4714">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4715">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4715">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4716">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4717">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4717">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4718">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4719">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4719">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4720">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4720">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4721">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4721">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4723">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4723">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4726">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4726">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4727">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4727">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4728">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4728">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4730">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4730">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4732">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4732">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4733">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4733">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4734">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4734">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4736">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4736">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4737">numéro passeport italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4737">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4738">numéro passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4738">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4739">意大利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4739">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4740">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4742">指定模式中的16个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4742">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4744">16个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4744">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4745">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4745">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4746">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4746">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4747">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4747">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4748">一个与出生月份对应的数字（字母按字母顺序使用），但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，在一月份为 A 和10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4748">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4749">两个数字，对应于出生月份中的某一天，其中40将添加到偶数的出生日，以区别于奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4749">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4750">与某人出生的 municipality 特定的区号相对应的四个数字（国家/地区代码用于外国国家/地区）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4750">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4751">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4751">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4752">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4753">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4754">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4755">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4755">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4756">函数  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4756">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4757">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4757">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4758">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4759">函数  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4759">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4794">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4794">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4796">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4796">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4797">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4798">银行帐号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4798">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4799">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4799">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4800">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4800">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4801">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4801">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4802">空格或破折号（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4802">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4803">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4803">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4808">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4808">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4809">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4810">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4810">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4811">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4812">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4814">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4814">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4815">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4815">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4874">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4874">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4876">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4876">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4877">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4878">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4878">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4880">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4882">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4882">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4883">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4883">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4884">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4884">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4912">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4912">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4913">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4914">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4914">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4915">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4916">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4916">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4918">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4920">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4921">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4921">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4922">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4922">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4923">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4923">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4929">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4929">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4930">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4931">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4931">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4932">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4933">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4933">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4934">两个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4934">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4935">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4935">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4936">两个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4936">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4937">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4938">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4939">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4940">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4940">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4941">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4941">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4942">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4942">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4945">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4945">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4946">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4946">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4947">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4947">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4949">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4949">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4951">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4951">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4953">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4953">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4955">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4957">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4958">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4958">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4959">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4959">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4973">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4973">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4975">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4975">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4976">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4977">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4977">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4978">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4978">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4979">一个连字符（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4979">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4980">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4980">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4981">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4981">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4982">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4983">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4984">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4985">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4986">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4986">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4987">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4987">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4988">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4988">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4989">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4989">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4990">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4990">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4991">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4991">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4994">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4994">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4995">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4995">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-4997">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4997">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-4998">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4998">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-4999">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-4999">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5000">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5001">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5001">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5002">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5003">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5003">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5004">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5004">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5005">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5005">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5006">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5007">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5007">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5008">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5009">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5010">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5010">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5011">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5011">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5027">拉脱维亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5027">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5028">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5028">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5029">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5030">11位数字和指定格式的连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5030">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5031">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5032">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5032">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5033">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5033">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5034">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5034">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5035">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5035">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5036">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5036">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5037">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5038">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5038">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5039">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5040">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5041">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5041">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5042">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5042">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5043">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5043">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5044">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5044">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5107">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5107">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5108">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5108">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5110">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5110">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5112">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5112">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5113">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5113">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5114">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5114">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5116">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5119">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5119">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5120">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5120">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5123">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5123">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5124">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5124">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5125">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5125">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5126">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5126">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5127">拉脱维亚税标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5127">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5128">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5128">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5129">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5129">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5130">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5130">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5131">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5131">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5132">指定模式中的11位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5132">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5133">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (DDMMYY) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5133">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5134">一个与 "出生世纪" 相对应的数字，其中 "0" 对应于19世纪，"1" 对应于20世纪，"2" 对应于21世纪。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5134">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5135">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5135">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5136">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5137">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5137">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5138">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5139">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5140">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5140">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5141">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5141">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5142">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5143">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5143">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5206">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5206">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5207">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5207">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5208">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5209">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5209">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5210">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5210">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5211">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5211">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5212">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5213">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5213">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5214">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5215">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5216">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5216">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5217">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5217">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5218">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5218">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5220">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5220">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5221">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5221">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5222">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5222">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5223">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5223">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5224">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5224">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5225">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5225">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5233">立陶宛国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5233">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5234">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5234">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5235">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5236">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5236">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5237">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5238">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5238">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5239">一个与人的性别和出生世纪对应的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5239">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5240">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5240">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5241">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5241">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5242">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5242">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5244">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5244">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5247">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5247">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5248">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5248">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5250">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5250">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5285">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5285">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5286">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5286">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5287">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5288">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5288">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5289">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5290">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5290">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5292">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5292">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5294">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5295">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5295">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5296">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5296">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5297">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5297">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5299">护照号码 lithunian 护照号码护照无 paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5299">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5300">立陶宛税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5300">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5301">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5301">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5303">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5303">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5305">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5305">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5306">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5307">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5307">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5308">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5309">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5310">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5310">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5311">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5311">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5312">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5313">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5313">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5347">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5347">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5348">他的敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5348">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5350">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5350">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5351">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5352">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5352">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5354">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5357">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5358">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5358">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5363">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5363">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5364">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5364">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5365">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5365">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5366">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5366">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5367">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5367">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5368">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5368">driver's license</span></span>
