## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5374">Luxemburg 国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5374">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5375">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5375">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5377">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5377">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5378">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5379">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5379">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5380">一个与人的性别和出生世纪对应的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5380">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5381">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5381">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5382">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5382">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5383">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5383">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5384">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5385">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5385">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5386">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5387">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5388">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5389">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5412">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5412">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5413">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5413">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5414">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5415">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5415">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5416">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5416">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5417">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5417">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5418">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5419">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5419">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5420">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5421">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5422">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5422">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5423">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5423">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5424">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5424">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5426">护照号码拉脱维亚语护照号码 passport 无 passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5426">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5427">Luxemburg 税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5427">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5428">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5428">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5429">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5429">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5430">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5430">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5431">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5431">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5432">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5432">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5433">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5433">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5434">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5434">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5435">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5436">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5436">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5437">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5438">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5438">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5439">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5439">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5440">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5440">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5441">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5442">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5442">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5482">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5482">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5484">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5484">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5486">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5486">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5487">六个数字，采用  YYMMDD 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5487">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5488">一个短划线（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5488">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5489">两个字母的出生地代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5489">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5490">一个短划线（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5490">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5491">三个随机数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5491">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5492">一位性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5492">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5493">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5494">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5495">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5496">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5496">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5497">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5497">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5498">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5498">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5525">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5525">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5526">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5528">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5528">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5530">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5530">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5531">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5531">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5532">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5532">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5533">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5533">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5534">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5534">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5535">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5535">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5537">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5539">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5540">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5541">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5542">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5542">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5544">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5544">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5545">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5545">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5546">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5546">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5547">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5547">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5548">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5548">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5549">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5549">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5553">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5553">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5554">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5554">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5557">马耳他国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5557">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5558">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5558">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5559">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5560">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5560">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5561">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5562">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5562">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5563">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5563">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5564">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5564">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5566">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5566">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5569">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5569">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5570">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5570">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5571">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5571">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5572">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5572">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5583">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5583">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5589">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5589">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5590">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5591">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5592">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5592">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5593">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5593">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5594">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5594">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5596">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5598">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5599">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5600">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5601">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5601">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5607">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5607">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5608">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5608">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5610">对于马耳他 nationals：7位数和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5610">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5611">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5611">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5613">马耳他 nationals：7个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5613">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5614">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5614">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5615">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5615">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5616">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5616">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5617">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5617">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5618">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5619">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5619">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5620">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5621">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5622">函数  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5622">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5623">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5623">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5624">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5624">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5625">函数  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5625">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5641">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5641">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5642">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5642">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5643">免税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5643">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5644">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5644">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5645">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5645">tax registration number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5658">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5658">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5660">8-9 个数字（包含可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5660">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5662">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5662">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5663">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5663">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5664">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5664">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5665">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5665">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5666">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5666">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5667">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5667">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5669">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5672">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5672">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5673">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5673">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5674">函数 Func_eu_date2 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5674">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5675">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5675">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5699">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5699">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5700">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5700">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5701">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5702">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5702">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5703">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5704">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5704">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5705">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5706">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5706">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5707">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5708">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5709">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5709">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5710">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5710">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5728">荷兰国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5728">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5729">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5731">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5731">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5732">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5733">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5733">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5734">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5735">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5736">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5737">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5738">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5738">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5739">找到了中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5739">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5740">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5740">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5741">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5741">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5765">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5765">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5766">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5766">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5767">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5767">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5768">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5768">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5769">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5769">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5770">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5770">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5771">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5772">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5772">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5773">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5774">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5775">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5775">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5776">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5776">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5777">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5777">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5778">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5778">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5779">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5779">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5780">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5780">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5781">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5781">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5782">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5782">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5783">paspoort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5783">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5784">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5784">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5785">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5785">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5786">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5786">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5787">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5787">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5788">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5789">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5789">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5791">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5791">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5792">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5793">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5793">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5794">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5796">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5796">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5797">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5797">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5798">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5798">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5799">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5799">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5837">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5837">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5838">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5839">三个字母、一个空格（可选）以及四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5839">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5840">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5841">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5841">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5842">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5843">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5843">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5844">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5845">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5845">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5846">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5846">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5847">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5847">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5848">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5848">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5849">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5849">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5851">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5851">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5852">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5852">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5853">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5853">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5854">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5854">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5855">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5855">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5856">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5856">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5857">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5857">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5858">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5858">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5859">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5859">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5860">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5860">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5861">三位个人号码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5861">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5862">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5862">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5863">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5864">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5864">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5865">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5866">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5866">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5867">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5867">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5868">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5868">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5869">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5869">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5870">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5870">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5871">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5871">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5872">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5872">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5874">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5874">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5875">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5875">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5876">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5876">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5877">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5877">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5878">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5878">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5879">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5879">Personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5881">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5881">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5882">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5883">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5883">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5884">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5885">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5885">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5886">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5886">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5887">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5887">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5888">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5888">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5889">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5889">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5890">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5890">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5891">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5891">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5892">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5892">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5893">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5893">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5894">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5895">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5895">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5896">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5896">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5897">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5897">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5900">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5900">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5901">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5901">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5903">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5903">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5904">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5904">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5905">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5906">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5906">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5907">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5908">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5908">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5909">五位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5909">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5910">一个正斜杠 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5910">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5911">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5911">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5912">一个正斜杠 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5912">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5913">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5913">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5914">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5915">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5915">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5916">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5917">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5918">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5918">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5919">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5919">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5920">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5920">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5922">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5922">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5923">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5923">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5924">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5924">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5925">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5925">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5926">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5926">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5927">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5927">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5928">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5928">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5929">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5929">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5930">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5930">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5931">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5931">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5932">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5932">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5933">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5933">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5934">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5934">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5935">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5935">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5936">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5937">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5937">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5938">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5939">三个字母（不区分大小写）后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5939">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5941">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5941">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5943">DLP 策略75% 确信在300个字符的邻近度内检测到此类型的敏感信息：函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5944">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5944">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5945">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5946">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5948">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5948">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5949">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5949">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5950">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5950">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5951">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5951">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5954">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5954">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5955">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5955">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5956">波兰国家/地区 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5956">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5957">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5957">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5959">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5959">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5960">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5961">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5961">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5962">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5963">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5964">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5965">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5965">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5966">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5966">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5967">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5967">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5968">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5968">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5969">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5969">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5971">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5971">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5972">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5972">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5973">niepowtarzalny 器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5973">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5980">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5980">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5981">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5983">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5983">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5984">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5985">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5985">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5987">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-5989">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5989">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5990">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5990">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5991">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5991">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5992">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5993">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5993">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5995">器 paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5995">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5996">Führerschein-nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5996">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5997">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5997">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-5998">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5998">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-5999">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-5999">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6000">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6000">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6001">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6002">不带空格或分隔符的11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6002">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6003">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6004">11位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6004">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6005">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6006">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6006">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6007">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6008">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6009">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6009">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6010">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6010">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6012">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6012">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6042">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6042">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6043">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6043">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6044">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6044">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6045">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6046">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6046">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6047">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6048">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6048">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6049">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6049">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6050">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6050">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6051">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6051">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6052">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6052">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6053">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6053">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6054">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6054">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
