## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6074">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6074">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6075">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6075">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6076">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6076">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6077">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6077">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6078">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6078">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6079">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6079">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6080">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6080">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6081">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6081">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6082">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6082">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6083">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6083">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6084">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6084">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6085">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6086">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6086">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6087">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6088">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6089">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6089">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6090">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6090">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6106">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6106">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6107">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6107">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6108">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6108">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6109">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6109">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6110">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6110">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6111">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6111">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6112">一个字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6112">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6113">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6113">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6114">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6115">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6116">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6117">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6117">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6118">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6118">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6119">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6119">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6120">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6120">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6122">护照号码葡萄牙语护照号码护照无 número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6122">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6123">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6123">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6124">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6124">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6125">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6126">9个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6126">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6127">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6128">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6128">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6129">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6129">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6130">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6130">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6131">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6131">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6132">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6132">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6133">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6133">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6134">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6134">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6135">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6136">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6136">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6161">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6161">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6173">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
```

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6190">罗马尼亚国家身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6190">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6191">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6192">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6193">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6193">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6194">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6195">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6195">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6196">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6197">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6197">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6198">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6199">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6199">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6200">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6200">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6201">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6201">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6202">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6203">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6203">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6254">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6254">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6255">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6256">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6257">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6257">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6258">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6259">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6259">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6260">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6261">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6262">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6263">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6264">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6264">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6265">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6265">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6266">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6266">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6268">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6268">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6269">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6269">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6270">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6270">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6271">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6271">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6272">罗马尼亚税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6272">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6273">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6273">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6274">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6275">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6275">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6276">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6277">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6277">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6279">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6279">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6281">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6282">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6282">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6283">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6283">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6285">Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6285">Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6293">identificarea fiscală nr#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6293">identificarea fiscală nr #</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6334">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6334">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6335">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6336">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6336">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6337">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6338">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6338">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6339">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6340">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6340">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6341">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6342">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6343">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6343">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6344">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6344">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6347">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6347">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6348">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6348">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6349">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6349">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6350">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6350">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6351">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6351">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6352">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6353">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6353">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6354">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6354">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6355">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6355">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6356">字母“F”、“G”、“S”或“T”（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6356">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6357">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6357">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6358">一个字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6358">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6360">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6360">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6363">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6363">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6364">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6364">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6365">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6365">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6366">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6367">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6367">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6368">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6379">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6379">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6380">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6380">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6381">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6382">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6382">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6383">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6384">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6384">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6385">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6385">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6386">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6386">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6387">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6388">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6388">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6389">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6390">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6391">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6391">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6392">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6392">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6393">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6393">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6394">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6394">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6395">dl # 驱动程序许可证驱动程序许可证号码驱动程序许可证驱动程序许可证驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6395">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6397">斯洛伐克国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6397">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6398">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6398">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6401">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6402">10个数字，包含一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6402">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6403">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6404">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6405">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6406">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6407">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6407">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6408">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6408">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6410">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6410">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6457">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6457">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6458">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6458">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6459">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6460">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6460">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6461">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6462">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6462">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6464">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6467">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6467">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6468">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6468">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6469">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6469">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6471">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6471">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6472">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6472">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6473">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6473">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6474">číslo pasu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6474">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6475">斯洛伐克纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6475">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6476">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6478">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6478">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6479">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6480">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6480">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6481">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6482">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6483">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6484">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6485">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6485">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6486">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6486">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6533">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6533">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6534">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6534">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6535">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6536">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6536">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6537">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6538">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6538">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6539">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6540">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6540">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6541">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6542">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6543">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6543">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6544">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6544">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6546">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6546">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6549">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6549">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6550">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6550">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6551">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6551">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6552">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6552">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6553">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6553">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6554">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6554">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6555">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6555">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6556">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6556">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6557">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6557">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6560">斯洛文尼亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6560">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6561">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6561">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6562">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6563">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6563">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6564">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6565">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6565">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6566">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6566">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6567">与出生区域对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6567">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6568">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6568">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6569">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6569">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6570">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6571">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6571">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6572">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6573">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6573">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6574">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6574">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6575">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6575">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6576">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6577">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6577">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6589">national id</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6605">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6605">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6606">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6606">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6607">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6607">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6608">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6608">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6609">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6609">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6610">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6610">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6611">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6611">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6612">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6612">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6613">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6613">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6614">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6614">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6615">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6615">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6616">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6616">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6617">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6617">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6618">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6618">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6619">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6619">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6620">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6620">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6622">护照号码斯洛文尼亚语护照号码护照无številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6622">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6623">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6623">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6624">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6624">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6625">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6626">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6626">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6627">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6628">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6628">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6629">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6630">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6630">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6631">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6632">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6632">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6633">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6633">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6634">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6634">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6635">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6635">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6636">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6636">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6660">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6660">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6662">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6662">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6664">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6664">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6665">六个数字，采用  YYMMDD 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6665">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6666">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6666">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6667">一位公民指示码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6667">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6668">数字“8”或“9” </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6668">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6669">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6669">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6671">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6674">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6674">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6675">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6675">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6676">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6677">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6677">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6682">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6682">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6684">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6684">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6686">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6686">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6687">六个数字，采用  YYMMDD 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6687">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6688">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6688">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6689">一个数字，由世纪和性别 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6689">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6690">四位数字的出生地区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6690">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6691">一个数字，用于区分前面数字均相同的人 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6691">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6692">一个校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6692">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6693">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6694">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6694">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6695">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6697">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6697">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6698">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6698">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6699">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6699">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6700">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6701">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6701">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6702">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6707">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6707">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6708">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6708">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6709">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6709">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6710">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6710">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6711">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6711">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6713">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6713">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6715">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6715">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6716">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6716">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6717">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6717">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6718">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6719">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6719">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6720">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6721">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6722">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6722">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6723">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6723">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6760">西班牙国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6760">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6761">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6763">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6763">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6764">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6765">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6765">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6766">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6766">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6767">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6767">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6768">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6769">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6769">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6770">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6771">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6772">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6772">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6773">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6773">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6797">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6797">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6798">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6799">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6800">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6800">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6801">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6802">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6802">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6803">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6803">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6804">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6804">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6805">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6805">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6806">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6807">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6807">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6808">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6809">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6809">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6810">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6810">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6811">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6811">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
