## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6823"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6823">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6824">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6824">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6826">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6826">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6828">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6828">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6829">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6829">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6830">正斜杠（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6830">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6831">7-8 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6831">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6832">正斜杠（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6832">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6833">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6833">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6834">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6835">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6835">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6836">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6837">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6837">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6838">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6838">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6839">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6840">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6840">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6841">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6841">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6842">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6842">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6843">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6843">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6845">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6845">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6847">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6847">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6848">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6848">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6849">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6849">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6850">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6850">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6851">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6851">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6852">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6852">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6853">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6853">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6854">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6854">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6855">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6855">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6856">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6856">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6857">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6857">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6858">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6858">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6859">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6859">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6860">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6860">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6861">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6861">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6862">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6862">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6863">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6863">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6864">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6864">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6865">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6865">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6867">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6867">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6870">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6870">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6871">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6871">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6872">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6873">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6873">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6904">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6904">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6905">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6906">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6906">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6907">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6907">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6908">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6908">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6909">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6909">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6910">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6910">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6911">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6911">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6912">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6912">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6913">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6913">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6914">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6914">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6915">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6916">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6916">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6917">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6918">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6918">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6919">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6919">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6920">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6920">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6921">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6921">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6922">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6922">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6923">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6925">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6925">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6926">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6926">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6927">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6927">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6928">采用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6928">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6930"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6930">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6931">密码或密码后跟0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 空格和一个星号 ( \* ) --或--------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6931">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6932">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6932">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6933">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6933">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6934">小于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6934">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6935">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6935">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6936">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6936">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6938"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6938">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6939">尚未</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6939">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6940">送交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6940">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6941">罗斯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6941">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6942">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6942">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6943">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6943">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6944">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6944">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6950">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6950">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6951">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6951">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6952">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6953">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6953">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6954">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6955">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6955">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6956">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6956">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6957">一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6957">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6958">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6958">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6959">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6960">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6960">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6961">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6962">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6963">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6963">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6964">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6964">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6965">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6966">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6966">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6967">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6967">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6968">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6968">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6969">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6969">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6970">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6970">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6971">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6971">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6972">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6972">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6973">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6973">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6974">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6974">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6975">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6975">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6976">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6976">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6977">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6977">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6978">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6978">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6980">瑞典国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6980">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6981">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6983">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6983">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6984">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6985">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6985">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6986">2-4 位数字（可选）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6986">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6987">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6987">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6988">“-”或“+”（可选）的分隔符，加</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6988">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6989">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6989">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6990">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6991">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6991">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6992">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6993">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6994">函数 Func_swedish_national_identifier 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6994">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-6995">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6996">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6996">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6997">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6997">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-6998">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6998">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-6999">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-6999">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7000">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7001">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7001">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7002">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7003">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7003">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7005">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7007">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7008">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7008">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7009">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7009">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7010">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7010">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7011">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7011">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7042">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7042">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7043">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7043">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7045">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7045">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7046">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7047">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7047">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7048">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7048">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7049">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7049">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7050">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7050">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7051">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7051">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7052">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7052">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7053">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7054">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7054">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7055">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7056">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7057">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7057">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7058">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7058">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7059">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7059">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7060">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7076">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7076">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7077">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7078">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7079">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7079">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7080">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7081">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7081">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7082">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7082">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7083">加号、减号或反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7083">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7084">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7084">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7085">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7085">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7086">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7086">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7087">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7087">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7088">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7089">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7089">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7090">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7091">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7091">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7092">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7092">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7093">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7093">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7094">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7094">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7095">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7095">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7121">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7121">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7122">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7123">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7123">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7124">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7125">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7125">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7126">四个字母的银行代码（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7126">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7127">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7127">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7128">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7128">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7129">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7129">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7130">1-3 个字母或数字（BBAN 的剩余内容）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7130">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7131">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7132">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7132">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7133">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7134">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7135">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7135">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7136">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7136">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7137">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7137">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_swift"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7138">Keyword_swift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7138">Keyword_swift</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7139">international organization for standardization 9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7139">international organization for standardization 9362</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7140">iso 9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7140">iso 9362</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7141">iso9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7141">iso9362</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7142">反应\#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7142">swift\#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7143">swiftcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7143">swiftcode</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7144">swiftnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7144">swiftnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7145">swiftroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7145">swiftroutingnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7146">swift code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7146">swift code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7147">swift number #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7147">swift number #</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7170">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7170">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7172">一个字母后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7172">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7173">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7174">一个字母后跟 9 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7174">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7175">一个字母（英文，不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7175">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7176">数字“1”或“2”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7176">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7177">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7177">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7178">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7179">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7179">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7180">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7181">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7182">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7182">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7183">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7183">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7184">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7184">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7185">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7185">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7186">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7186">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7187">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7193">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7193">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7200">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7200">簽名</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7204">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7204">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7205">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7206">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7206">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7207">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7207">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7208">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7209">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7209">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7210">数字“3” </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7210">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7211">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7211">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7212">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7212">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7213">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7213">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7215">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7215">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7218">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7218">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7219">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7219">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7230">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7230">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7231">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7231">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7232">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7232">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7233">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7233">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7234">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7234">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7235">两个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7235">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7236">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7236">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7237">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7238">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7239">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7240">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7241">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7241">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7242">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7242">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7256">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7256">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7258">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7258">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7259">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7260">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7260">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7261">第一个数字不是0或9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7261">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7262">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7262">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7263">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7264">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7264">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7265">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7266">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7266">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7267">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7267">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7268">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7268">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7269">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7270">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7270">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7279">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7279">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7280">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7280">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7281">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7281">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7282">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7282">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7283">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7283">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7284">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7284">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7285">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7285">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7286">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7286">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7287">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7287">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7288">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7288">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7289">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7289">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7290">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7290">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7291">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7291">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7298">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7298">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7299">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7299">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7300">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7300">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7301">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7302">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7302">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7303">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7304">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7304">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7305">用五个字母（不区分大小写）或数字“9”来代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7305">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7306">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7306">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7307">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7307">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7308">用两个字母（不区分大小写）或数字“9”来代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7308">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7309">五位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7309">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7310">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7311">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7311">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7312">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7313">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7314">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7314">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7315">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7315">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7316">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7323">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7323">125cc</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7324">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7324">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7325">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7325">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7326">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7326">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7327">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7327">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7328">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7328">learner drivers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7331">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7331">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7332">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7332">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7333">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7333">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7334">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7334">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7335">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7335">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7336">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7336">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7337">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7337">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7338">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7338">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7339">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7339">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7340">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7341">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7341">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7342">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7343">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7344">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7344">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7345">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7345">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7352">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7352">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7353">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7353">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7354">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7355">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7355">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7356">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7357">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7357">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7358">3 或 10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7358">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7359">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7359">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7360">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7360">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7361">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7361">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7362">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7362">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7363">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7364">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7365">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7366">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7367">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7367">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7368">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7368">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7369">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7370">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7370">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7371">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7371">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7372">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7372">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7390">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7390">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7391">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7391">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7392">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7392">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7394">由空格或短划线分隔的7个字符或9个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7394">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7396">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7396">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7397"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7397">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7398">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7398">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7399">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7399">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7400">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7400">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7401">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7401">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7402">一个空格或破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7402">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7403">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7403">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7404">一个空格或破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7404">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7405">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7405">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7406">一个空格或破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7406">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7407">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7407">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7408">一个空格或破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7408">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7409">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7409">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7410">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7411">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7412">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7413">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7414">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7414">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7415">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7415">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7416">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7417">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7417">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7418">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7418">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7425">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7433">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7433">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7434">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7434">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7435">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7435">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7436">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7437">唯一纳税人引用 (UTR) ：不带空格和分隔符的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7437">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7438">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7439">唯一纳税人引用 (UTR) ：10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7439">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7440">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7441">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7441">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7442">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7443">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7444">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7444">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7445">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7445">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
