## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7465">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7465">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7466">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7466">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7467">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7467">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7468">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7468">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7469">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7469">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7470">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7471">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7472">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7473">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7474">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7474">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7475">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7475">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7505">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7505">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7507">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7507">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7509">取决于州 — 例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7509">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7510">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7510">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7511">诸如 dddddddd 的 9 个数字将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7511">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7513">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7513">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7516">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7516">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7517">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7517">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7518">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7518">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7519">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7519">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7520">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7520">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7521">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7521">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7522">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7522">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7523">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7523">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7621">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7621">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7623">九个数字，以“9”开头，“7”或“8”作为第四个数字，可以采用空格或短划线格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7623">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7625">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7625">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7626">数字“9”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7626">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7627">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7627">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7628">一个空格或破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7628">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7629">“7”或“8”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7629">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7630">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7630">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7631">一个空格或破折号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7631">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7632">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7632">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7633">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7633">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7634">数字“9”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7634">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7635">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7635">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7636">“7”或“8”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7636">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7637">五位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7637">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7638">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7639">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7639">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7640">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7641">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7641">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7642">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7642">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7643">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7643">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7644">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7644">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7645">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7645">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7646">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7646">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7647">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7647">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7649">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7649">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7650">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7650">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7651">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7651">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7652">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7652">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7653">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7653">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7674"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7674">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7675">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7676">9 个数字，可以是格式化模式，也可以是非格式化模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7676">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7677">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7677">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7678">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7679">四种不同模式中的 SSN 的四种函数外观：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7679">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7680">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7680">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7681">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7681">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7682">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7682">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7683">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7683">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7684">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7685">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7685">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7686">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7687">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7688">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7688">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7689">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7689">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7690">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7690">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7691">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7691">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7692">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7692">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7693">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7693">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7694">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7694">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7695">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7695">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7696">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7697">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7697">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7698">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7698">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7709">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7709">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7710">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7710">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7711">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7711">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7712">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7712">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7713">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7714">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7714">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7715">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7716">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7716">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7717">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7717">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7718">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7718">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="51c13-7719">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7719">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51c13-7720">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7720">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7721">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7721">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="51c13-7722">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51c13-7722">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
